title: La Grande Galerie de Versailles, et les deux salons qui l'accompagnent (The Grand Gallery of Versailles and Two Accompanying Salons)
medium: bound volume with 56 engravings including 1 engraved portrait of Massé and 23 double-spread plates
attribution: Jean-Baptiste Massé (designer and author) and various engravers after Charles Le Brun, with an engraved portrait of J-B Massé by Johann Georg Wille after Louis Tocqué
